item.title: A white substance and the Moon
item.summary: A certain white substance found upon a bush, formerly said to proceed from the Moon. By /han≠kass'o (L VIII.-23. 8040 rev., note).
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-23
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: and what |han≠kass'o's people say about a white substance found on bushes
a white substance found on them
